title: Finally got accepted to PBE.......but......
body: So i finally got accepted to PBE and whenever I to try to create an account via the email that was sent i keep getting an "Error 500" screen. Come on Riot, throw me a friggin' bone here guys. Are you guys having a problem or is there something i can do to fix it.

replies.body: We've received a few reports on this and being looked into.   In the meantime, running Incognito or another browser can help.  Otherwise, we've seen that using a VPN has helped players in most cases.  Hopefully that does the trick!
its been like 3 days now and i still cant directly access the PBE page. Is PBE broken right now or something. I was really looking forward to this.
